This package is installable by accessing the following code along with the listed packages:

```{r}
devtools::install_github("madelinepye/sodium_channel.pkg")
```

In this tutorial, we will be using this data set collected for the 2019 paper ___, the set by which this package was designed for.

```{r}
#install.packages("googlesheets4")
library(googlesheets4)
googlesheets4::gs4_deauth()
sodium_data <- read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1KkQl2t9AQ7L0yUngONNebEjbr-tVC3WLaHjdTLSHW-o/edit?usp=sharing")
```

This R package is designed for manipulating and interpreting data collected from a sodium channel experiment. This package can create plots, manipulate data frames, and summarize data based on some techniques used to evaluate sodium channel voltage data.
